section.p: Sets the encoder configuration for the local video. Sets the encoder configuration for the local video.
section.note: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel. You can call this method either before or after joining a channel. If the user does not need to reset the video encoding properties after joining the channel, Agora recommends calling this method before to reduce the time to render the first video frame. If the user does not need to reset the video encoding properties after joining the channel, Agora recommends calling this method before to reduce the time to render the first video frame.
